医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
澳大利亚国立大学科学家发现导致银屑病和银屑病关节炎的基因突变澳大利亚国立大学 (ANU) 的科学家发现，一种基因突变导致牛皮癣——一种慢性炎症性皮肤病，会导致患者全身出现红色、鳞状和发痒的斑块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/ANU-scientists-uncover-gene-mutation-driven-psoriasis-and-psoriatic-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/ANU-scientists-uncover-gene-mutation-driven-psoriasis-and-psoriatic-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7fd0f35-8ba2-4655-922e-19c93220ade7 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 15:38:40 -0400 ANU scientists uncover gene mutation driving psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis
MUTYH 基因突变与各种实体瘤风险增加有关约翰霍普金斯大学金梅尔癌症中心、约翰霍普金斯大学彭博公共卫生学院和约翰霍普金斯大学彭博公共卫生学院的研究人员对超过 350,000 份患者活检样本进行的一项研究表明，与结直肠癌相关的基因似乎也在其他实体瘤的发展中发挥着作用。基础医学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/MUTYH-gene-mutation-linked-to-increased-risk-of-various-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/MUTYH-gene-mutation-linked-to-increased-risk-of-various-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04c23ddf-f351-47e6-912a-1af394398828 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 15:28:24 -0400 MUTYH gene mutation linked to increased risk of various solid tumors
UVA 研究人员开发在线工具来对抗儿童腹泻病弗吉尼亚大学的研究人员正在开发一种灵活的在线工具，用于导航信息，通过识别传播热点并加速治疗和新疫苗的部署来拯救儿童免受致命腹泻病的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/UVA-researchers-develop-online-tool-to-combat-childhood-diarreal-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/UVA-researchers-develop-online-tool-to-combat-childhood-diarreal-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=157fa26d-51af-4756-b1dd-5d508deb64ab Mon, 25 Mar 2024 15:13:59 -0400 UVA researchers develop online tool to combat childhood diarrheal diseases
肠系膜淋巴结的免疫反应提高了对克罗恩病的了解克罗恩病是一种慢性炎症性肠病，有时免疫抑制疗法无法充分控制，随后需要手术切除受影响的肠段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Immune-responses-in-mesenteric-lymph-nodes-improve-understanding-of-Crohns-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Immune-responses-in-mesenteric-lymph-nodes-improve-understanding-of-Crohns-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ff5a5b3-21cc-42e5-99f4-f5dbbdc00643 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 14:53:00 -0400 Immune responses in mesenteric lymph nodes improve understanding of Crohn's disease
米非司酮案危在旦夕：堕胎、FDA 的权威以及 1873 年淫秽法的回归赢得推翻罗伊诉韦德案的保守基督教团体的律师将于周二返回美国最高法院，以寻求一项紧迫的优先事项：禁止全国妇女获得堕胎药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/At-stake-in-mifepristone-case-Abortion-FDAe28099s-authority-and-return-to-1873-obscenity-law.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/At-stake-in-mifepristone-case-Abortion-FDAe28099s-authority-and-return-to-1873-obscenity-law.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a6fa9f5-75c3-443e-9bdb-5a6a3457d288 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 14:45:14 -0400 At stake in mifepristone case: Abortion, FDA’s authority, and return to 1873 obscenity law
疫情过后，3 岁和 4 岁儿童的超重和肥胖率有所下降疫情过后，瑞典 3 岁和 4 岁儿童的超重和肥胖率有所下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Overweight-and-obesity-in-3-and-4-year-olds-has-decreased-after-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Overweight-and-obesity-in-3-and-4-year-olds-has-decreased-after-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a670306-535b-4ac0-acbb-851eb0759b90 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 14:20:32 -0400 Overweight and obesity in 3- and 4-year-olds has decreased after the pandemic
研究人员探索牙齿脱落与假牙使用、饮食改变和认知能力下降之间的联系最近的一项 npj 衰老研究评估了受牙齿缺失影响的特定大脑区域及其相关原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Researchers-explore-link- Between-tooth-loss-and-denture-usage-diet-changes-and-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Researchers-explore-link- Between-tooth-loss-and-denture-usage-diet-changes-and-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8c87099-c8d8-4cda-bd05-f6a35a86671a Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:58:00 -0400 Researchers explore link between tooth loss and denture usage, diet changes and cognitive decline
父母的困境：决定何时让孩子在家不上学一项新的全国民意调查显示，许多家长在决定他们的初中或高中年龄的孩子感觉不舒服时是否应该留在家里不上学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Parental-dilemmas-Deciding-when-to-keep-a-child-home-from-school.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Parental-dilemmas-Deciding-when-to-keep-a-child-home-from-school.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4092be9-0347-4b23-8129-f3226b007a45 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:57:50 -0400 Parental dilemmas: Deciding when to keep a child home from school
揭示表观遗传对自身免疫性皮肤病的影响中心法则提出，在基因表达过程中，遗传信息主要从 DNA 转移到 RNA，以产生功能性产物蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Unraveling-epigenic-contributions-to-autoimmune-skin-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Unraveling-epigenic-contributions-to-autoimmune-skin-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44f7e6f0-9e44-46ce-8ee8-833d56465f5d Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:45:00 -0400 Unraveling epigenetic contributions to autoimmune skin diseases
新化合物有望成为更有效的血吸虫病治疗方法一种新开发的化合物在动物研究中显示出有望作为人类血吸虫病更有效的治疗方法，血吸虫病是一种由寄生虫引起的热带疾病，尚未得到充分研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/New-compound-shows-promise-as-a-more- effective-treatment-for-schistosomiasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/New-compound-shows-promise-as-a-more- effective-treatment-for-schistosomiasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77d77024-2e9a-451b-87cf-35bc6a25fcf8 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:31:11 -0400 New compound shows promise as a more effective treatment for schistosomiasis
